LC_Type1.name: Land Cover Type 1: Annual InternationalGeosphere-Biosphere Programme (IGBP) classification

LC_Type2.name: Land Cover Type 2: Annual University of Maryland (UMD) classification

LC_Type3.name: Land Cover Type 3: Annual Leaf Area Index (LAI) classification

LC_Type4.name: Land Cover Type 4: Annual BIOME-Biogeochemical Cycles (BGC) classification

LC_Type5.name: Land Cover Type 5: Annual Plant Functional Types classification

LC_Prop1.name: FAO-Land Cover Classification System 1 (LCCS1) land cover layer

LW.name: Binary land (class 2) / water (class 1) mask derived from MOD44W
